item.description:
Lean Workshop at 6:30pm.
For our September Meetup, we'll be hosting a Lean Workshop. We're inviting individuals or Lean Startup Companies to make a short, 5 minute presentation, talking about what they're working on, and to come with question(s) they'd like the group to answer.

This is a great opportunity for members of the Lean Startup Community to put their ideas out there, tell us where you are, and get ideas on how to move forward.

Workshop Participants:
1. OneForty.com
2. RelayHR.com
3. MuckRock.com

Early Bird Presentation: Customer Development 101, with John Prendergast
For those new to the concepts of Customer Development and The Lean Startup, please come early. From 6:00 to 6:30pm, John Prendergast, Organizer of the LSC Boston Meetup and CEO of BlueLeaf.com will talk about the basics of customer development and lean startups.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston Monthly Meetup
